Before we begin the proceedings, I shall go over the

First on the agenda, I will explain the agenda.

Fifth on the list, we will enact whatever procedure
And finally, the meeting will be adjourned.

Aspiring member, you will be permitted to speak to

However, we must address the important thing that I'm

Our duty, above all else, is to increase the energy

For as it is written in the Book of Enlightening by

I would like to offer my thoughts.

The manual says that if you increase the power past

Huh, I have to agree with that.
